value.descriptionInPortuguese: Aprender inglês é prazeroso e surpreendente
value.descriptionInEnglish: Learning English is enjoyable and surprising
value.title: Kids
value.noticeText: This course is available both in person and online

value.textInPortuguese:
Com a alfabetização em português já consolidada, empregamos atividades, todas em inglês, que colocam os alunos no mundo da língua inglesa, estimulando o gosto e o interesse por ela.


Ao final de dois anos, as crianças estão com ótima pronúncia, excelente vocabulário e um domínio de estruturas gramaticais básicas que permitem a comunicação.
value.textInEnglish:
With literacy in Portuguese already established, we use activities, all in English, that immerse students in the world of the English language, stimulating their interest and enthusiasm for it.

 

At the end of two years, children achieve excellent pronunciation, an impressive vocabulary, and a solid grasp of basic grammatical structures, enabling effective communication.
value.text:
With literacy in Portuguese already established, we use activities, all in English, that immerse students in the world of the English language, stimulating their interest and enthusiasm for it.

 

At the end of two years, children achieve excellent pronunciation, an impressive vocabulary, and a solid grasp of basic grammatical structures, enabling effective communication.

value.nextStepTextInPortuguese: Após sua passagem pelo Kids, a criança ingressa no curso Juniors.
value.nextStepTextInEnglish: After completing Kids, the child progresses to the Juniors course.
value.nextStepText: After completing Kids, the child progresses to the Juniors course.

value.title: I want to know more
value.subject: Formulário BRASAS - Quero saber mais
value.levelingTitle: To start, discover your level with our placement test.
value.levelingSubtitle: Our placement test helps you find out which module you should enroll in. Access the link below and start your test now!
value.formSubtitle: Leave your details below and we will contact you for more information.
value.acceptanceTermText: I agree to receive communications and personalized offers according to my interests

value.title: Quero saber mais
value.levelingTitle: Para começar, descubra seu nível em nosso teste de nivelamento.
value.levelingSubtitle: O nosso teste de nivelamento te ajuda a descobrir em que módulo você deve ingressar. Acesse o link abaixo e comece o seu teste agora mesmo!
